## DefaultLogger.writeMessage() method

Write the message to the log output.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected writeMessage(isError: boolean, message: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isError | <code>boolean</code> | <code>true</code> if the message is an error message, <code>false</code> if it is a debug message. |
|  message | <code>string</code> | Formatted message text to output. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

This implementation uses `console` to write messages. The method can be overriden in a subclass to provide a different log output.
